definition: to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲

sentences.english: Blame every problem in a project on the offshore team.
sentences.chinese: 把項目中所有的問題都怪罪在離岸團隊頭上。

sentences.english: The bears couldn’t make it to shore, as the sea ice was several hundred miles offshore when it ice broke up.
sentences.chinese: 這些熊沒有辦法上岸，海冰離岸數百英里冰就破碎了。

sentences.english: We'd rather have you quote us F O B prices.
sentences.chinese: 希望能給我們報離岸價。

sentences.english: Our quotation is $70 per set of tape-recorder, FOB Tianjin.
sentences.chinese: 我們的報價是每臺錄音機70美元，天津離岸價。

sentences.english: Many companies are engaging in some version of outsourcing and offshoring.
sentences.chinese: 許多公司熱衷使用一些外包和離岸開發的版本。

sentences.english: I'd like to have your lowest quotations, F. O. B. Hongkong.
sentences.chinese: 我想知道貴方香港離岸價的最低報價。

sentences.english: With only a half mile to go, she asked to be pulled out.
sentences.chinese: 她在離岸僅半英里處要求支援船把她拉上去。

sentences.english: Using the concept of directional wave fields, the characteristics of the wave field around a detached breakwater were studied.
sentences.chinese: 本研究利用方向頻譜探論離岸堤周圍波場的特性。

sentences.english: The electricity is then fed into an offshore grid via undersea cables.
sentences.chinese: 電力隨即通過海底電纜被送入離岸電網中。

sentences.english: All transport transshipment charges will be included in the C. I. F. price.
sentences.chinese: 這批貨物是以包括理艙費在內的離岸價格成交的。

sentences.english: Re-write a significant part of code delivered by the offshore team with out any communication.
sentences.chinese: 重寫離岸團隊交付的大量代碼，而且不要跟他們交流。

sentences.english: All our FOB prices are listed here. But they are subject to our final confirmation.
sentences.chinese: 我們所有的離岸價都在這裏，但要經我們最後確認。

sentences.english: Dould you offer us F. O. B. prices?
In this paper, we studied the off-shore and on-shore RMB derivatives market and the interrelation between them.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究離岸和在岸人民幣衍生品市場及關聯問題。

sentences.english: We make a counter-offer to you of $150 per metric ton F. O. B. London.
sentences.chinese: 開茶葉我們討價爲每公噸倫敦離岸價150美元。

sentences.english: Please quote 150kg of Jasmine Tea FOB Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 請報150公斤茉莉花茶上海離岸價。

definition: abbr. for 自由貿易區|自由贸易区[zi4 you2 mao4 yi4 qu1]
